layout.name: jumpSet
layout.title: Jump Behavior
layout.tooltip: Determines how it would jump. Don't Jump - it will not jump. Jump - it will jump upwards. Jump Up & Down Blocks - it will jump up and down through blocks; however, it may be buggy to zip through blocks as unintended.

layout.name: hitSet
layout.title: Hit Behavior
layout.tooltip: Determines how it is fought throughout the fight. Hit Head Consecutively - it will not jump. Jump - it will jump upwards. Jump Up & Down Blocks - it will jump up and down through blocks.

layout.name: makeFunniDeath
layout.title: Make A Funny Death Effect?
layout.tooltip: When Defeated and set this to true, it stays in place and then explodes in bits.

layout.name: isStomping
layout.title: Make Things To Fall?
layout.tooltip: Makes a short hop of a stomp, causing NPCs to fall from specified BGOs
